title: What is this Unicase font
content:
Can someone tell me what this unicase font is please

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Pricing.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015221029/http:/typophile.com/files/Pricing.jpg) | 31.15 KB |
author: Katekaks

comments.content:
thanks but the 'k' for this font isn't quite the same.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015221029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/peak_4798.jpg)
ahh, but the sample didn't have a /K in it...
The picture above shows the K. :)

I guess you haven't look to my link carefully... I wrote "PRICInG" to get the right /N so, for this /k, you need to write it " [peak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015221029/http:/myfonts.us/td-gh33Vs)".
Ahhh I see thanks so much. :)
